name: Bard
description:
As a bard, you can play any [note block] instrument. Playing certain note patterns can give you various results, like activating a power for example. 

In order to play a note, you'd have to press either the primary, or secondary key once. 

To cycle through the instruments, you can press sneak. 

To switch octaves, you can press the secondary ability key. 

To change key signature, you can press the primary ability key.
